daily_activities: Arrival in Bangkok, Thailand
Visit the Grand Palace
Explore the nightlife at Khao San Road
Hike to the top of Wat Arun
Take a cooking class to learn about Thai cuisine
Visit the Museum of Siam
Travel to Chiang Mai, Thailand
Explore the old city walls and moat
Visit the Chiang Mai Night Bazaar for shopping
Take a trek through the hills of Chiang Mai
Visit the Doi Suthep temple
Enjoy dinner at a traditional Thai restaurant
Travel to Siem Reap, Cambodia
Explore the ancient temples of Angkor Wat
Visit the Angkor National Museum
Take a hike through the jungle surrounding Angkor Wat
Visit the vibrant Pub Street for nightlife
Shop for souvenirs at the Old Market
Travel to Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Visit the War Remnants Museum
Explore the Cu Chi Tunnels
Take a day trip to the Mekong Delta
Enjoy a street food tour of Ho Chi Minh City
Visit the Ben Thanh Market for shopping
Travel to Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
Visit the Petronas Twin Towers
Explore the Batu Caves
Take a hike at the Taman Negara National Park
Visit the Islamic Arts Museum
Enjoy a farewell dinner at a rooftop restaurant

travel_instructions.route_details: From Ahmedabad, take a flight to a major Southeast Asian city such as Bangkok, Singapore, or Kuala Lumpur, with possible layovers in cities like Mumbai or Delhi.
